name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: X Unfollower | Smart follow / unfollow tool for Twitter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate unfollow / follow tool for X (Twitter). Filter inactives, small accounts, protect follow backs, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly unfollow & follow people on X with smart filters.

How to use this extension?
Go to your ùïè profile and click on the "Open ùïè Unfollower" button.
Set the filters as you wish to get a refined list of results.
Then, simply click the "Unfollow All" button, or manually unfollow specific users.

Or go to another users profile and click "Open ùïè Follower" button, and similarly follow accounts using our smart filters.

Filter accounts by:
 - Set maximum inactive days
 - Set minimum follower count for people to be unfollowed
 - Optionally protect people who follow you back from being unfollowed



Want to clean up your following on X (Twitter) ?

Sometimes it can be long and tedious to filter through.
Let this extension do the work while you sit back and relax.
